name: Instance Magazine. Issue 01.  Autumn/Winter 2011
description:
INSTANCE MAGAZINE
Issue 01

Autumn/Winter 2011
UK 5 EU 7 US 10
Printed in London
32 pages / 317mm Ã— 457mm 


Editorial
INSTANCE MAGAZINE is an bi-annual publication, which intends to blur the boundaries between publications and exhibitions. An exhibition touring Europes leading culture cities will run along side the current issue, showcasing the work featured in the magazine.

The magazine is printed in black and white with the aim of tempting the viewer to attend the exhibition and see the work in its true form.

Colophon
Editor, design and concept by Jamie Coull
www.jamiecoull.com
